summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's account from May 1, 2019, to May 31, 2019. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and the ending balance, highlighting significant outgoing transfers.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the account holder for the financial transactions detailed in the document.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer
events.description: A transfer of $58,333.07 was made from Jeffrey Epstein's account.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer
events.description: A transfer of $100,000.00 was made from Jeffrey Epstein's account.

keyFacts: The document details Jeffrey Epstein's account balance and transactions for May 2019.
The beginning balance on May 1, 2019, was $558,333.07.
Two significant outgoing transfers were made: one for $58,333.07 and another for $100,000.00.
The ending balance as of May 31, 2019, was $50.00.
The document includes service charges totaling $50.00 for the statement period.
